oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Waiting room at Union Station, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 August 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The waiting room at Nashville’s Union Station at Broadway and 10th Avenue, August 28th, 1958. The structure is a prominent architectural and historical landmark, placed on the National Register of Historic Places circa 1975. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Union Station (Nashville, Tenn.)
